Package database

Class Read

java.lang.Object
database.Read
public class Read extends Object
This class manages the reading of records from the database.

    • readProjects

      public static List<Project> readProjects(String chainBy, String... conditions)
      Reads projects from the database based on specified conditions.
      Parameters:
      chainBy - The logical operator (e.g., "AND", "OR") to chain conditions.
      conditions - The conditions to filter the projects.
      Returns:
      A list of Project objects matching the conditions.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The Engineer object, or null if not found.

    • getAllPersons

      public static List<? extends Person> getAllPersons(Class<? extends Person> clazz, List<Integer> excludedPersonIDs)
      Retrieves all persons of a specific type, optionally excluding specific IDs.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class type of the persons to retrieve.
      excludedPersonIDs - A list of person IDs to exclude from the results.
      Returns:
      A list of persons matching the specified class type.
